title: SignEasy
description: A sleek, user-friendly tool to sign PDFs digitally with ease. Upload your document, sketch your signature, and download—secure and fast, all in your browser. Made with Grok 3.

title: Terminal Cheatsheet
description: A comprehensive collection of terminal commands for GitHub, Windows, Mac, and VPS. Easy to copy commands with explanations. Made with Grok 3.
